title: Best Buy Has Slashed Prices on TP Link Smart Home Products by as Much as 40%
description: Save on smart bulbs, home security, Wi-Fi boosters and more.
author: Amber Guetebier
excerpt: Save on smart bulbs, home security, Wi-Fi boosters and more.
text: Whether it's working from home or home security, smart home devices can enhance our daily lives. And from Wi-Fi extenders to smart locks, TP Link makes some of our best-loved smart home products. Their products hold numerous spots on our favorite Wi-Fi extenders list as well as top home security cameras. Right now, Best Buy has dropped the prices on numerous TP Link smart home products, some by as much as 40%. We've highlighted some of our favorites below.
